title: Media Elites Decide the News You See | Guests: Matt Palumbo & Kim Iversen | 1/20/22
description:
Glenn Beck discusses the New York Times book list and his book's current ranking, but is somebody manipulating the algorithm and the numbers? Anne Quiner and her attorney Marjorie Holsten join to discuss Anne’s husband's battle with COVID and her lawsuit against a hospital in Minnesota. Glenn and Stu discuss the absurdity of hospitals refusing care and losing empathy for unvaccinated patients. Author Matt Palumbo joins to discuss his new book, “The Man Behind the Curtain: Inside the Secret Network of George Soros.” Kim Iversen, host of "The Kim Iversen Show," joins Glenn to discuss the Great Reset and how many still believe it’s a conspiracy theory despite the evidence. Glenn and Stu discuss Stu's five-month quest to buy his new car.
